src:
Hong Kong police use water cannon as protesters throw petrol bombs - video
02 Nov 2019, 16:31 by Reuters, AP



Hong Kong riot police fired teargas rounds and used a water cannon on Saturday to break up a rally by thousands of masked protesters after Beijing indicated it might tighten its grip on the territory


Hong Kong protesters attack Chinese news agency offices
